mapper.insert: insert comp(comp_nm,comp_con,spt,repo) values(#{compNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compCon, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repo, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.delete: delete from comp where comp_idx = #{compIdx, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from comp

select comp_idx as compIdx, comp_nm as compNm, comp_con as compCon, spt as spt, repo as repo, DATE_FORMAT(writing_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as writingTime, read_check as readCheck from comp order by comp_idx desc LIMIT #{start}, #{end}
select * from comp where read_check = false
select * from comp where read_check = true
